mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS expiryNum,(SUM(t.shouldcapital) + SUM(t.shouldinterest)) AS expiryAmount FROM t_loan_order t WHERE t.status = 6 AND t.`orgcode`=#{orgCode}

SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS sevenDaysNum,(SUM(t.shouldcapital) + SUM(t.shouldinterest)) AS sevenDaysAmount FROM t_loan_order t WHERE t.status IN (3 ,6) AND t.actualrepaymentdate <= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND t.`orgcode`=#{orgCode}
SELECT t.producttype as productId , SUM(t.shouldcapital) AS amount FROM t_loan_order t WHERE t.status IN (3 ,6) AND t.`orgcode`=#{orgCode} GROUP BY t.producttype;
